name: Nyctalopia
description:
Nyctalopia is a co-op multiplayer survival horror game. 

Story

A devil outbreak occurs on a hospital during the doctor's, which is one of the main characters,  midnight shift. Darkness starts to prevail in the hospital wards and the doctor, because of a strange disease called Nyctalopia, he can't adapt to the low brightness. He can only use his hearing to navigate through the hospital wards.

The second player has the control of the security guy that during the devil outbreak was inside the Security Camera Room. Now locked inside the room, his only ability is to watch through the CCTV cameras and help the doctor to find the exit. He can switch through the cameras and send audio and visual cues by interacting with the environment.

The two players must cooperate in order to overcome all the obstacles that are waiting in the hospital wards.

Nyctalopia is a game of trust.

Controls Doctor

WASD -> Movement

Security Guy

Q and E -> Switch Camera
Arrow Keys -> Sent Audio Cues on Player
Mouse Click -> Interact with Objects
